forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 62F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 18C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain developing after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
